body_html:
python object_detection/export_inference_graph.py
--input_type image_tensor
--pipeline_config_path faster_rcnn_resnet101.config
--trained_checkpoint_prefix model.ckpt-STEP_NUMBER
--output_directory output_inference_graph
this is the command I used. The python file mentioned above to convert can be found in this link
https://github.com/bourdakos1/Custom-Object-Detection/blob/master/object_detection/export_inference_graph.py
body_text:
python object_detection/export_inference_graph.py 
--input_type image_tensor 
--pipeline_config_path faster_rcnn_resnet101.config 
--trained_checkpoint_prefix model.ckpt-STEP_NUMBER 
--output_directory output_inference_graph
this is the command I used. The python file mentioned above to convert can be found in this link
https://github.com/bourdakos1/Custom-Object-Detection/blob/master/object_detection/export_inference_graph.py
body:
python object_detection/export_inference_graph.py \
        --input_type image_tensor \
        --pipeline_config_path faster_rcnn_resnet101.config \
        --trained_checkpoint_prefix model.ckpt-STEP_NUMBER \
        --output_directory output_inference_graph
this is the command I used. The python file mentioned above to convert can be found in this link
https://github.com/bourdakos1/Custom-Object-Detection/blob/master/object_detection/export_inference_graph.py
